label: Extra DOF eaten by W/Z
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Extra DOF eaten by W/Z. Validation: Unitary gauge longitudinal lock
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144

# Goldstone modes absorbed: 3 DOF eaten by W+, W-, Z0
# Higgs doublet (4 DOF) - 3 Goldstones = 1 physical Higgs
goldstone_modes = 3              # W+, W-, Z longitudinal
higgs_dof = 4                    # Complex doublet
physical_higgs = higgs_dof - goldstone_modes
verified = physical_higgs == 1
